Class USLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • USLocalizer

  • public class USLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    AsherW: Given that the robot is in a corner block, uses the Ultrasonic sensor to scan the area around it and determine its orientation. Then sets the orientation on the odometer accurately.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACCELERATION
      The acceleration of the motors (lower acceleration = less slip)
      private static int FILTER_OUT
      The amount of max value readings the sensor must read to consider it a real value (and not an error)
      private int filterControl
      The amount of times the robot has read a max-distance value
      private float lastDistance
      The value of the last distance the robot has read
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor 
      private USLocalizer.LocalizationType locType
      The type of localization that the robot performs
      private Odometer odo
      The robot's odometer
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor 
      static int ROTATION_SPEED
      The speed at which the robot rotates when performing the localization
      private float[] usData
      The float array that contains the ultrasonic data
      private SampleProvider usSensor
      The robot's Ultrasonic sensor
      private static int WALL_DIST
      The distance that the robot reads to consider it a wall
      private static int WALL_GAP
      The buffer distance value to ensure the robot reads a wall accurately

      Converts an angle we want the robot to rotate in place to a degree amount to spin the wheel by (to reach the angle)
      private static int convertDistance(double radius, double distance)
      Converts a distance to be traveled by a wheel to the amount of degrees to turn the wheel.
      void doLocalization()
      Uses the Ultrasonic sensor to perform a "localization", where it figures out its initial starting angle and turns to face along the x-axis.
      private float getFilteredData()
      Gets the data from the ultrasonic sensor and returns the distance value

    • Constructor Detail

      • USLocalizer

        public USLocalizer(Odometer odo,
                   SampleProvider usSensor,
                   float[] usData,
                   USLocalizer.LocalizationType locType)
        Constructor for the Localizer
        Parameters:
        odo - The odometer being used by the robot
        usSensor - The ultrasonic sensor that the robot is using
        usData - The float array containing the ultrasonic data of the sensor.
        locType - The type of localization. FALLING_EDGE Vs RISING_EDGE

    • Method Detail

      • doLocalization

        public void doLocalization()
        Uses the Ultrasonic sensor to perform a "localization", where it figures out its initial starting angle and turns to face along the x-axis. This method actually performs the localization

      • convertDistance

        private static int convertDistance(double radius,
                                   double distance)
        Converts a distance to be traveled by a wheel to the amount of degrees to turn the wheel.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the wheel being spun
        distance - The distance that we want to spin
        Returns:
        The amount of degrees to spin the wheel by to travel the distance

      • convertAngle

        private static int convertAngle(double radius,
                                double width,
                                double angle)
        Converts an angle we want the robot to rotate in place to a degree amount to spin the wheel by (to reach the angle)
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the wheel
        width - The track of the robot (distance between two wheels)
        angle - The angle by which the robot should rotate
        Returns:
        The amount to rotate the wheel

      • getFilteredData

        private float getFilteredData()
        Gets the data from the ultrasonic sensor and returns the distance value
        Returns:
        The distance currently being read by the ultrasonic sensor
